name: Destination Dungeon: Crypts of Warthallow Sound Track
detailed_description:
Destination Dungeon:Crypts of Warthallow Sound Track


A collection of high quality, new full length music tracks not included with the original game. All tracks come in mp3 format.

TRACK LIST:
Destination Dungeon:Crypts of Warthallow Track 1 - Length 3:07
Destination Dungeon:Crypts of Warthallow Track 2 - Length 2:32
Destination Dungeon:Crypts of Warthallow Track 3 - Length 2:40
Destination Dungeon:Crypts of Warthallow Track 4 - Length 2:21
Destination Dungeon:Crypts of Warthallow Track 5 - Length 2:41

FEATURES:
5 New High Quality Full Length Tracks
MP3 Format

After installing this DLC, a folder titled DLC Sound Track will appear in your Destination Dungeon:Crypts of Warthallow app folder. This will contain the 5 High Quality Music Tracks.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Минимальные:
  • ОС: Win 7 32-bit or higher
  • Процессор: 2.0 ghz or higher
  • Оперативная память: 500 MB ОЗУ
  • Видеокарта: 500 Megs VRAM
  • DirectX: Версии 9.0
  • Место на диске: 500 MB
